recommendations: tanu sooden ‚ÄúSania is an extremely accountable colleague. Her unwavering support combined with her knowledge and high execution skills place her uniquely. I really enjoy working with her. ‚Äù

Mayannk Kausshik ‚ÄúHad the pleasure of working with Sanya Thadani Kataria while we were both at American Express. As a recruiter, Sanya demonstrated a strong ability to identify and attract top talent for the company. She was always well-prepared for interviews and had a keen eye for identifying candidates who would be a good fit for the organization. Sanya is a highly organized and detail-oriented professional, with excellent communication skills. She was always quick to respond to inquiries and kept me informed throughout the recruitment process. I would highly recommend Sanya for any recruiting needs. She has a thorough understanding of the industry and is able to identify and attract the best candidates for any role. Sanya is a valuable asset to any organization and I would be happy to work with her again in the future.‚Äù
